description: During translation of nova for liberty release, we noticed many inconsistent usages, especially in the capitalization of IP. IT should really be "IP" or as plural "IPs".
title: Inconsistent IP usage in help strings

comments.content: During translation of nova for liberty release, we noticed many inconsistent usages, especially in the capitalization of IP. IT should really be "IP" or as plural "IPs".
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jaegerandi

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/225923
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=a6ac4ec5d1c16cbb89fc5d2374f8ac90e9c31fb7
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit a6ac4ec5d1c16cbb89fc5d2374f8ac90e9c31fb7
Author: Andreas Jaeger <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Sep 21 18:12:48 2015 +0200

    Fix capitalization of IP
    
    It should be "IP" not "ip". Change strings
    that are user visible or documentation strings.
    Include some small updates in updated strings.
    This does not change any comments.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1524276
    Change-Id: I16147e60b60be0f51c2aeb404ea9ed9fd3066795
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
